segments.text: Isn't this lovely weather ? Will you help me water the flowers , Jack ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , do you think I have to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I do.We haven't watered them for quite a few days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please look at the sky.Don ' t you see the dark clouds ? It's going to rain soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good.So we don't have to work.How nice !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I don't think it's so nice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The weather report says it's going to rain for a whole week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I'm afraid all the flowers will die in the rain .
segments.speaker: S1
